content: MQP-R Channel foot Stainless steel (A4) channel foot for fastening channels to various base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Flexibility – complete many different applications using few parts Acoustic insulation – when used with the MVI-P insulation plate for MQP-21-72 rail supports Compatible with MQN-R push button channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Applications Connecting strut channels to various base materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Environmental conditions: Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) Technical Data | Material composition | Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 304047 - Base connector std duty MQP-21-72-R SS316 - Package Size 12 pc - 304048 - Base connector back-to-back MQP-82-R SS316 - Package Size 8 pc
